alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:40PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Corson, southwestern Campbell and northwestern Walworth Counties through 1215 AM CDT/1115 PM MDT/... At 1140 PM CDT/1040 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand River Casino, or near Mobridge, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Indian Memorial Rec Area around 1045 PM MDT. Mobridge around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Glenham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
